tool_description: We provide APIs to get items much easier to users
name: 1688-api
title: 1688-api

api_list.name: item detail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://1688-api.p.rapidapi.com/1688/v1/item/672681344671/detail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1688-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://1688-api.p.rapidapi.com/1688/v1/item/{id}/detail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1688-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
